channel.title: Jdk, and run problems. Please help!
channel.description:
Okay, I keep running my server thing. And it dissapears really quickly. And I know I portforwarded right. The pf tool told me my port was open. And stuff. Okay. This is what is in my runserver.bat thing.
[code]@echo off color 0a title Element Scape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
And I downloaded the first jdk on the list from this site
http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
Does anyone have any suggestions on what I can do? Please help. I have bean waiting for like ever to get my server up.

item.title: Jdk, and run problems. Please help!
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

Lin:

When you first go to Search, just double click the “Java” folder and click the “jdk****” folder, where the *s are your version and what not.

I don’t have that. Do you have teamviewer? Or can anyone help me through that way?

Read full topic
item.source: Jdk, and run problems. Please help!

@Lin wrote:

When you first go to Search, just double click the “Java” folder and click the “jdk****” folder, where the *s are your version and what not.

Read full topic
item.source: Jdk, and run problems. Please help!

item.title: Jdk, and run problems. Please help!
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

[quote=“Ziege Terra 117, post:8, topic:284312”]okay, I am feeling nice so I will practically spoon-feed you through this ^^

Just copy this into your Run Server:

@echo off color 0a title Element Scape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-6.0.14-ga-bin.jar server pause

That is it – See where it says “java-6.0.14”. That is what you change to match your version.

Like I said before, if you need any more help, just ask :)[/quote]

Thanks, because the EV finder didn’t work. I don’t know where to find my jdk folder. But thanks. I’m going see if it works now. Do I need JRE for anything?

EDIT: It still does the same thing. What could it be? Did I download JDK right? Because I installed it, then did nothing more. Man this is complicating! (Thanks for the help!)

Read full topic
item.source: Jdk, and run problems. Please help!

item.source: Jdk, and run problems. Please help!

item.title: Jdk, and run problems. Please help!
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

[quote=“Ziege Terra 117, post:5, topic:284312”]You need to change the 3.0.03 to the version JDK you currently have. I’ll explain better:

@echo off
color 0a
title Element Scape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Change the blue numbers to the version of JDK you have… You have to do the same thing for the compiler.

If you need any more help, just ask :)[/quote]

I downloaded the first one on that link that I gave. The version 6 update 14 I think. What do I change that to? I’m new at this. So it doesn’t come clear to me.

Read full topic
item.source: Jdk, and run problems. Please help!

item.title: Jdk, and run problems. Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Ziege_Terra_117 Ziege Terra 117
item.description:
@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

You need to change the 3.0.03 to the version JDK you currently have. I’ll explain better:

@echo off
color 0a
title Element Scape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Change the blue numbers to the version of JDK you have… You have to do the same thing for the compiler.

If you need any more help, just ask

Read full topic
item.source: Jdk, and run problems. Please help!

item.title: Jdk, and run problems. Please help!
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

[quote=“Ziege Terra 117, post:2, topic:284312”]Okay, put a ‘pause’ on the bottom line of your Run Server script, so it looks like this:

@echo off color 0a title Element Scape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause [/quote]

Okay, I did that. And I got this.

Do I need to download anything? Or change that 3.0.08. Or something? I’m new at this. And I did exactly what the mopar tutorial told me to. Please, I need help.

Read full topic
